page.title: 01STARCROSS,POWDERHAM & R.EXE.
page.content: There are several items of interest in this block bordering the{River Exe.} From{Starcross}there are extensive views over the{Exe Estuary}towards{ {Exmouth}and from{Powderham}there are views towards{Lympstone. The block is dominated by{POWDERHAM {CASTLE,}home of the Courtenay family,Earl's of Devon,for 600 years. In{STARCROSS}there is the{"BRUNEL {ATMOSPHERIC RAILWAY"}housed in an old pumping house of the Exeter-Newton Abbot railway of 1847.The main railway line from{Plymouth/Penzance}and{London {& The North}runs alongside the estuary through part of this block.
